definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: Jos 13:47, = [[בַּעַל]] [[מְעוֹן]] Nu 32:38, Ez Eze 25:9, 1Ch 5:8 (MI [[בעל מען]] & [[בת]] [[בעל מען]]) = [[בֵּית מְעוֹן]] Je 48:23 = [[בְּעׂן]] Nu 32:3 (rd. prob. [[מען]]; cf. Dr:Sm lxviii); city assigned to Reuben Jos 13:17, Nu 32:3, Nu 32:38, 1Ch 5:8; possessed by Moab Je 48:23, Ez Eze 25:9;—mod. Ma‘în  Tristr:Moab 303 f. Schick:ZPV ii. 1879, 5 Survey:EP i. 176 Bd:Pal 192.
